page.title: 06BROADBRIDGE HEATH SPORTS
page.content: The Sports Centre is situated just off the new{Broadbridge Heath by-pass outside Horsham down Wickhust Lane. At the moment the sports centre is only a collection of{run down huts. The site used to be used in the Second World War by the{army}for a bomb disposal unit.The huts are set around the former drill square which is now used for parking.The huts are leased out to clubs and organisations e.g {badminton and football.}Also,a group of{Sea cadets}and a{Dramatic society (Horsham Amateur and Operatic Drama Society - HAODS) use some huts.Around the huts are playing fields used for {football,tennis and cricket.}There are plans for a new sports centre and hypermarket to be built on this site.
